trans-unit.source: Defines the different language versions of the Gregorian calendar.
trans-unit.target: Definisce le diverse versioni del calendario gregoriano.

trans-unit.source: The date and time patterns associated with the <xref:System.Globalization.GregorianCalendar> vary depending on the language.
trans-unit.target: I modelli di data e ora è associato il <xref:System.Globalization.GregorianCalendar>variano a seconda del linguaggio.</xref:System.Globalization.GregorianCalendar>

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.Globalization.GregorianCalendar> is selected in <xref:System.Globalization.DateTimeFormatInfo.Calendar%2A?displayProperty=fullName>, GregorianCalendarTypes can be used to specify which date and time patterns to use in that <xref:System.Globalization.DateTimeFormatInfo>.
trans-unit.target: Se <xref:System.Globalization.GregorianCalendar>è selezionata, <xref:System.Globalization.DateTimeFormatInfo.Calendar%2A?displayProperty=fullName>GregorianCalendarTypes può essere usato per specificare i modelli di data e ora di utilizzare tale <xref:System.Globalization.DateTimeFormatInfo>.</xref:System.Globalization.DateTimeFormatInfo> </xref:System.Globalization.DateTimeFormatInfo.Calendar%2A?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Globalization.GregorianCalendar>

trans-unit.source: For Arabic cultures, more language versions of the Gregorian calendar are available.
trans-unit.target: Per impostazioni cultura arabe, sono disponibili più versioni di lingua del calendario gregoriano.

trans-unit.source: For example, you can use the French version of <xref:System.Globalization.GregorianCalendar> using the MiddleEastFrench value.
trans-unit.target: Ad esempio, è possibile utilizzare la versione italiana di <xref:System.Globalization.GregorianCalendar>utilizzando il valore MiddleEastFrench.</xref:System.Globalization.GregorianCalendar>

trans-unit.source: A culture that supports <xref:System.Globalization.GregorianCalendar> might not support all language versions of <xref:System.Globalization.GregorianCalendar>.
trans-unit.target: Delle lingue supportate <xref:System.Globalization.GregorianCalendar>potrebbero non supportare tutte le versioni localizzate di <xref:System.Globalization.GregorianCalendar>.</xref:System.Globalization.GregorianCalendar> </xref:System.Globalization.GregorianCalendar>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Globalization.CultureInfo.Calendar%2A?displayProperty=fullName> and <xref:System.Globalization.CultureInfo.OptionalCalendars%2A?displayProperty=fullName> properties specify the calendars supported by that culture.
trans-unit.target: Il <xref:System.Globalization.CultureInfo.Calendar%2A?displayProperty=fullName>e <xref:System.Globalization.CultureInfo.OptionalCalendars%2A?displayProperty=fullName>specificano i calendari supportati dalle impostazioni cultura.</xref:System.Globalization.CultureInfo.OptionalCalendars%2A?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Globalization.CultureInfo.Calendar%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: If <xref:System.Globalization.GregorianCalendar> is supported, <xref:System.Globalization.GregorianCalendar.CalendarType%2A> can be used to determine which language versions of <xref:System.Globalization.GregorianCalendar> are supported.
trans-unit.target: Se <xref:System.Globalization.GregorianCalendar>è supportato, <xref:System.Globalization.GregorianCalendar.CalendarType%2A>può essere usato per determinare quali versioni di lingua di <xref:System.Globalization.GregorianCalendar>sono supportati.</xref:System.Globalization.GregorianCalendar> </xref:System.Globalization.GregorianCalendar.CalendarType%2A> </xref:System.Globalization.GregorianCalendar>

trans-unit.source: Refers to the Arabic version of the Gregorian calendar.
trans-unit.target: Fa riferimento alla versione del calendario gregoriano araba.

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: Da aggiungere.

trans-unit.source: Refers to the localized version of the Gregorian calendar, based on the language of the <xref:System.Globalization.CultureInfo> that uses the <xref:System.Globalization.DateTimeFormatInfo>.
trans-unit.target: Fa riferimento alla versione localizzata del calendario gregoriano, in base alla lingua di <xref:System.Globalization.CultureInfo>che utilizza <xref:System.Globalization.DateTimeFormatInfo>.</xref:System.Globalization.DateTimeFormatInfo> </xref:System.Globalization.CultureInfo>

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: Da aggiungere.

trans-unit.source: Refers to the Middle East French version of the Gregorian calendar.
trans-unit.target: Fa riferimento alla versione del calendario gregoriano francese Medio Oriente.

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: Da aggiungere.

trans-unit.source: Refers to the transliterated English version of the Gregorian calendar.
trans-unit.target: Fa riferimento alla versione in lingua inglese traslitterata del calendario gregoriano.

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: Da aggiungere.

trans-unit.source: Refers to the transliterated French version of the Gregorian calendar.
trans-unit.target: Fa riferimento alla versione francese traslitterata del calendario gregoriano.

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: Da aggiungere.

trans-unit.source: Refers to the U.S. English version of the Gregorian calendar.
trans-unit.target: Fa riferimento a negli Stati Uniti Versione in lingua inglese del calendario gregoriano.

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: Da aggiungere.
